min-max normalization

Source: R/base.R
normalization.Rd

min-max normalization

Usage

normalization(x, z = 0.2)

Arguments

x

numeric vector

z

scalar add minimum value to avoid 0

Value

normalized vector

Examples

normalization(runif(100,min = -100, max = 100))
#>   [1] 0.6356808 0.2746821 1.1645029 0.7364645 1.0435525 1.1047125 1.0572523
